column5: Hello OFNers.  I have lost all my tabs when my hard drive recently crashed. I am looking for the camp located between ARA and Meta lake. There was a cabin on the point in the channel between the 2 lakes. I think this camp was sold recently. Perhaps it is no longer being rented?

Hey there I think the meta channel cabin is now owned by Meta Lake lodge or at the very least Meta LL operates an outpost in the channel http://www.metalakelodgefishing.com/channel-view-outpost.html Hope this helps Cheers Gordy

Thanks Gordy! . That must be the spot. I had seen this site but completely missed the description " mouth of the Meta/Ara lake channel " . I guess i was just focusing on a map location. Time to add this to potential spots for 2019.
